Name: Decision
Text Area 1: How did you win your hand?

Name: Process
Text Area 1: Add fu for each triplet and quad.

Name: Rectangle
Text Area 1: Simples:  +2 fu open triplet. +4 fu closed triplet. +8 fu open quad. +16 fu closed quad.

Name: Rectangle
Text Area 1: Terminals/honors:  +4 fu open triplet. +8 fu closed triplet. +16 fu open quad. +32 fu closed quad.

Name: Process
Text Area 1: Round total fu up to the nearest 10.

Name: Rectangle
Text Area 1: Add fu based on triplet/quad fu.  Ron is open, tsumo is closed.

Name: Rectangle
Text Area 1: Quick notes: 	5+ han does not require fu calculation. 	Ron on two-sided sequence wait with no triplets is 30 fu. 	Most tsumos and open hands are 30 fu in the absence of 	pinfu or terminal/honor triplets or quads. 	Most closed rons are 40 fu in the absence of pinfu or 	terminal/honor triplets or quads.

Name: Rectangle
Text Area 1: ​+2 fu if your pair is dragons or seat/round wind.
